name: Throwaway Bay
description:
Let's go to the beach 🏖️♻️

Throwaway Bay is a match-3 game that incorporates elements of roguelikes to build upon your arsenal of beach cleaning skills.

Along the way you’ll be able to earn scraps from cleaning up each level that allow you to acquire Trinkets from the Trinket Booth. These will give you benefits that make beating the game easier and reward you for clearing levels.

Throwaway Bay conveys the importance of keeping your beach clean both for the enjoyment of beach goers, but also for the overall health of the ecosystem and the critters that call it their home.

Controls
  • [Left Click] - Drag & Swipe to move pieces
  • [Spacebar] - Advance dialogue
